name: IISWebAppDeploy
description: Connect via WinRM, to deploy Web project locally on IIS, using Web Deploy
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: machinesList
inputs.label: Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide a comma separated list of the machine(s) IP addresses or FQDNs along with ports. The port is defaulted based on the selected protocol or can be provided separately.
For example, dbserver.fabrikam.com, dbserver_int.fabrikam.com:5986, 192.168.12.34:40004.

inputs.name: AdminUserName
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the administrator's login of the target machines.

inputs.name: AdminPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the administrator's password of the target machines.
The best practice is to create a variable in the Build or Release definition, and mark it as 'Secret' to secure it, and then use it here, like '$(adminPassword)'.

inputs.name: WinRMProtocol
inputs.label: Protocol
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the network protocol to use for the WinRM connection with the machine(s). The default is HTTPS.

inputs.name: TestCertificate
inputs.label: Test Certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to skip validating the authenticity of the machine's certificate from a trusted certification authority. The parameter is required for the WinRM HTTPS protocol.

inputs.name: WebDeployPackage
inputs.label: Web Deploy Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the Web Deploy (MSDeploy) zip file on the target machine(s) or on a UNC path, like \\\\BudgetIT\WebDeploy\WebDeployPackage.zip. The UNC path should be accessible to the machine's administrator account. Environment variables are also supported, like $env:windir, $env:systemroot, $env:windir\FabrikamFibre\Web.

inputs.name: WebDeployParamFile
inputs.label: Web Deploy Parameter File
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Location of the Web Deploy Parameter file on the target machine(s) or on a UNC path.
The parameter file is used to override Web application configuration settings, like IIS Web application name or the database connection string.

inputs.name: OverRideParams
inputs.label: Override Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify parameters here to override the ones in the Web Deploy zip file and in the Parameter file. To override more than one parameter use line separator, e.g.,
name="IIS Web Application Name",value="Fabrikam"
name="ConnectionString", value="Server=localhost;Database=Fabrikam;"

inputs.name: WebsiteName
inputs.label: Website Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the website for deploying the Web project to.

inputs.name: DeployInParallel
inputs.label: Deploy in Parallel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to deploy the website in-parallel on the target machines.
